resources.string: Input some text to be drawn!
Phone ain\'t got no camera bih
Put in a name to save!
Don\'t look at me. It\'s not my fault.
Looks like you don\'t have an internet connection. Try enabling data, or reconnect to some sweet WiFi..
Looks like the thing you want doesn\'t exist. Fuck if I know what happened to it.
Looks like your device doesn\'t have a camera to take pictures with. This feature requires that you have a hardware camera
Pressing \"Got it\" deletes any drawing you currently have.
